column4: anyone have any ideas about how to get a live cd running version of ubuntu to use the closed nvidia drivers?
got some space on a hd free ?
Can't do it without installing to HD? I was thinking it might go into a ram drive or something. Or, is there some way I can make a custom ubuntu live cd that has the nvidia drivers on it?
little nervy with ram, would need enormous amount and after reboot its gone, yes there are ways to make custom-live, but I'm no specialist in that
